                                   +----oracle.plsql.NullValueException
public class NullValueException
extends PLSQLRuntimeException
This class indicates an exception has occurred because a PL/SQL NULL value is detected.

NullValueException(String)
Creates a new NullValueException with the specified detail message

NullValueException 
  public NullValueException(String s)
Creates a new NullValueException with the specified detail message
Parameters:
s - the detail message
